Direct Known Subclasses:
NewGameButton, NextLevelButton, SceneChangeButton
public abstract class Button extends com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.impl.TextEntity implements com.github.hanyaeger.api.userinput.MouseButtonPressedListener, com.github.hanyaeger.api.userinput.MouseEnterListener, com.github.hanyaeger.api.userinput.MouseExitListener
Basic class for creating a button to add to a screen

  • Constructor Details

    • Button

      public Button(com.github.hanyaeger.api.Coordinate2D initialLocation, String text, javafx.scene.paint.Color initialColor, javafx.scene.paint.Color hoverColor, String fontFamily, int fontSize)
      Creates a button at given location with given text
      Parameters:
      initialLocation - sets location on screen
      text - text to display on button
      initialColor - set text color of button
      hoverColor - set hover color of text
      fontFamily - font for text, if null gets default font
      fontSize - sets font size of text, if 0 or null gets default size
